text: 15.10 Apo 8.3, Lom 15.18-19, 2 Ko 3.5, 6.1, 11.5, 11.23, Plp 2.13 God pen yɨp yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gek, bɨne mɨdɨl, bɨ ak ke nɨb tek mɨdebin. Pen God yɨp yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gup ak, yokɨp mɨdɨl kul ma gup. Bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb okok wog gɨpal tek ma gɨpin, God yɨp yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gek, wog awl yɨbɨl ak gɨpin.
